short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension improves the Salesforce UI by adjusting the layout of some pages to make them more user friendly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have any Salesforce UI/UX pet peeves? This extension aims to fix them.

Salesforce Improved modifies the Salesforce UI by adjusting the layout of some pages to make them more user friendly.

For example:
- Automatically minimizes any Salesforce page pop-ups
- Modifies login page to always show recent logins in a more accessible format
- Hides annoying Lightning Page pop-ups and visual clutter
- Increases Flow modal window widths for better visibility of variable names
- Allow sorting of managed packages list in setup
...and more!

If you have suggestions for additional fixes, please email or add your request to the extension's GitHub page (https://github.com/mselchow/salesforce-improved-extension/issues).
